function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete vaccination data due to vaccinations taking place outside of the health system","Impact":"Underestimation of vaccination efficacy and inability to accurately assess waning vaccine efficacy","Mitigation":"Encourage data completion and presentation of infection rates in vaccinated versus unvaccinated groups","Technologies":"Data completion tools, data analysis software","People":"Authors, researchers","Owner":"Authors, research team"},{"Description":"Lower testing frequency in previously SARS-CoV-2 infected participants versus the control group","Impact":"Underestimation of reinfection cases and potential misinterpretation of effectiveness against reinfection","Mitigation":"Increase testing frequency in previously infected participants, adjust analysis for testing frequency discrepancies","Technologies":"Testing protocols, data analysis software","People":"Researchers, healthcare providers","Owner":"Research team, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Seroprevalence surveys suggesting higher infection rates than reported SARS-CoV-2 cases","Impact":"Underestimation of actual infection rates and potential misinterpretation of effectiveness against reinfection","Mitigation":"Conduct seroprevalence surveys, compare reported cases to estimated actual infections","Technologies":"Serological testing, data analysis software","People":"Epidemiologists, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations"}]}
